author: La Repubblica
title: Covid, il ministero cambia le regole. Dovremo rimetterci le mascherine?

author: Sean Salai
title: CDC: Fewer kids visited ER in first year of COVID-19
description: Fewer infants, children and teenagers visited emergency rooms in 2020 as hospitals discouraged non-COVID cases, according to federal data released Tuesday.
content:
